name: midi
description: Library to assist in creating HTML5 MIDI apps.
author: Michael Deal

scripts.devserver: budo js/MIDI.js:build/MIDI.js --live -- -t package-json-versionify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-3 ] ] -t rollupify --standalone MIDI
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && browserify -t package-json-versionify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-3 ] ] -t dedebug -t uglifyify -t rollupify --standalone MIDI js/MIDI.js > build/MIDI.js
